name: Apples & Pears
description:
Apples & Pears is a game about sorting food, specifically apples & pears (you guessed it). The food sorting company that hired you pays well, but your boss very picky. Mess up enough times and you might get fired!

This game was created for the first Miz Game Jam.

How to Play
Food items will randomly spawn. Among these foods are apples & pears, which you must drag into their respective sections. Be careful however, as dragging the wrong food item into a section will make your boss mad. Waiting too long and allowing apples & pears to de-spawn will also make your boss mad.

Made in Unity.
